title: Are there any bronze/silver players on here that need help that are actually willing to learn?
body:
I can spectate your replays if you want.  I tried to help some bronze 4 guy here, and he literally spit all my advice back at me and said I didnt help him even tho i typed a gigantic paragraph lol.

I can look at the replays later when I have time, just save them, or add me.


OH and for those just wanting a decent overview of the game... I have a massive guide on League in general.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/U5vQH3V4-you-want-to-actually-get-good-at-this-game-a-real-help-thread?show=flat
